T01TD1171E:249a-1: ma h'a pandi ta k'irti dhva dza sto tram /
T01TD1171E:249a-3: mkhas pa chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa /
T01TD1171E:249a-5: blo gros rgya mtshor tshig gi me tog snyan tshig ze'u 'brus rnam par spud pa bstod dbyangs kyi //
T01TD1171E:249a-6: phreng ba spel legs dag gis rab brgyus dri med chun pos gang gi mgul la brgyan gyur pa'i //
T01TD1171E:249a-7: blo gsal stong gis khyed kyi rang bzhin bsngags par gyur mod de lta na yang bdag rmongs pa //
T01TD1171E:249a-8: dad pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar nus bzhin cung zad bstod la mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par gsol //
T01TD1171E:249b-0: sgyu ma'i phreng ba'i las @249b kyi tshul gyis rmongs gang srid pa'i chu gter du //
T01TD1171E:249b-1: bsod nams gru chag blo gros lus bying ba shes gnyen dam pas dor ba yi //
T01TD1171E:249b-2: lus can rnams la byang chub yan lag drug phrag gsum gyi gzhung lugs kyi //
T01TD1171E:249b-3: rlung drag gtsubs pa'i dba' rlabs 'thor bas dam pa'i go 'phang pha rol son ;
T01TD1171E:249b-4: / grub pa dri med dge slong dge 'dun rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom brtson dang //
T01TD1171E:249b-5: brtul zhugs grub la blo gros gsal ldan rtog ge'i dbang po'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T01TD1171E:249b-6: khyed kyi zhabs rdul rnyog pa med la rnam pa kun tu gtugs slad du //
T01TD1171E:249b-7: gangs can 'di na 'gran zlas dben par mngon du gyur bzhin kho bos 'tshal //
T01TD1171E:249b-8: dam pa khyod kyi legs bshad bsod nams sprin //
T01TD1171E:249b-9: dge ba'i lo tog 'phel ba'i char rgyun can //
T01TD1171E:249b-10: snyan pa'i 'brug sgra zab mo snyong sgrogs pas //
T01TD1171E:249b-11: skal ldan blo gros gnyid log rnam par bskul //
T01TD1171E:249b-12: khyod kyis chos sgrub gzhung mang 'chad pa dang //
T01TD1171E:249b-13: legs bshad rtsom dang kha don rgya chen dang //
T01TD1171E:249b-14: ting 'dzin dri med 'khor lo mchod pa'i tshul //
T01TD1171E:249b-15: rnam dag lta ba spyod lam dag pa dang //
T01TD1171E:249b-16: gsang sngags rgya mtsho'i tshul la nyer bsten pa //
T01TD1171E:249b-17: khyod kyi kun spyod de dag thams cad la //
T01TD1171E:249b-18: rgol ba gzhan gyis kun nas mi rdzi bas //
T01TD1171E:249b-19: gsang sngags 'dzin pa gzhan la sngon ma mthong //
T01TD1171E:249b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin dkon mchog gzhal med dpal ldan gtsug lag khang chen dang //
T01TD1171E:249b-21: dga' ston dam pa sa gsum la grags chags bral khyod ni dpal dang 'byor bas rab dge zhing //
T01TD1171E:249b-22: thub pa'i sku gzugs gsung rab dag pa rin chen las bsgrubs kun nas mdzad pa rgya che ba //
T01TD1171E:249b-23: khyod mtshungs ma mchis de slad bdag blo spro ba'i chu klung dbyar gyi mtsho bzhin rnam par 'phel //
T01TD1171E:249b-24: bsod nams dri med zla zer zil gnon byams pa'i 'od zer rab 'phros pas //
T01TD1171E:249b-25: nam mkha'i zla ba rnyog can des ni khyod kyi dpal rab ma bzod de //
T01TD1171E:249b-26: gzugs brnyan tshul gyis rgya mtsho'i klong du 'jug pa 'dod pa nyid snyam du //
T01TD1171E:249b-27: bdag gi blo gros de ltar sems pas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur //
T01TD1171E:249b-28: gdud rgyud dri med yon tan rgya che ni //
T01TD1171E:249b-29: blo gros mtshungs med mkhas pas nyer bsten zhing //
T01TD1171E:250a-0: gzhan la phan dgongs phongs pa'i bsti gnas @250a * //
T01TD1171E:250a-2: / mdzad pa rgya chen nye bar zhi ba can //
T01TD1171E:250a-3: khyod mtshungs ma mchis de slad dpe bral ba //
T01TD1171E:250a-4: khyed la rnam kun bstod par nus ma lags //
T01TD1171E:250a-5: 'on kyang cung zad bstod pa'i spro ba dang //
T01TD1171E:250a-6: dge slong mkhas pa byang chub 'od zer gyis //
T01TD1171E:250a-7: rjes su gnang ba thob nas gang snang ba ;
T01TD1171E:250a-8: / de bzhin 'di ni bdag gis gsal bar sbyar //
T01TD1171E:250a-9: mchog tu rma dbyung grags pa rgyal mtshan la //
T01TD1171E:250a-10: mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal bdag gis //
T01TD1171E:250a-11: legs par bstod la bsod nams gang yod pa //
T01TD1171E:250a-12: des ni 'gro kun bla ma la gus shog / bdag nyid chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ga ta shr'i sa sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T01TD1171E:250a-14: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
T01TD1171E:250a-15: sh'akya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
